info.name: AI Agents API
info.description: Complete API collection for testing AI Agents service with organized agent folders

response.name: Success Response
response.body:
{
  "agent_name": "medical_followup",
  "user_id": "{{user_id}}",
  "session_id": "{{session_id}}",
  "sender": "SYSTEM",
  "success": true,
  "agent_response": "{\"followup_questions\": [\"What activities trigger the chest pain?\", \"Have you experienced similar pain before?\", \"Are you taking any medications?\"], \"count\": 3}"
}

item.name: Short Conversation - Chest Pain After Lifting

response.name: Success Response
response.body:
{
  "agent_name": "medical_conversation_insights",
  "user_id": "{{user_id}}",
  "session_id": "{{session_id}}",
  "sender": "SYSTEM",
  "success": true,
  "agent_response": "{\"summary\": \"Patient experiencing sharp, stabbing chest pain after lifting heavy boxes...\", \"key_findings\": [\"Sharp chest pain post-physical exertion\", \"Pain triggered by lifting\", \"Localized discomfort\"], \"action_items\": [\"Avoid heavy lifting\", \"Apply ice to affected area\", \"Monitor for worsening symptoms\"]}"
}

item.name: Medium Conversation - Chronic Headache with Screen Time

body.raw:
{
  "agent_name": "medical_conversation_insights",
  "user_id": "{{user_id}}",
  "session_id": "{{session_id}}",
  "sender": "USER",
  "query": [
    { "speaker": "Patient", "text": "I have a persistent headache for the past three days" },
    { "speaker": "Doctor", "text": "How long have you had it?" },
    { "speaker": "Patient", "text": "About three days now, it comes and goes" },
    { "speaker": "Doctor", "text": "What makes it better or worse?" },
    { "speaker": "Patient", "text": "It gets worse when I look at screens for long periods" },
    { "speaker": "Doctor", "text": "Any other symptoms like nausea or vision problems?" },
    { "speaker": "Patient", "text": "Some mild nausea and sensitivity to light" },
    { "speaker": "Doctor", "text": "Are you staying hydrated and getting enough sleep?" },
    { "speaker": "Patient", "text": "I've been sleeping only 5-6 hours lately due to work deadlines" }
  ],
  "features": [
    { "feature_name": "summary_length", "feature_value": 300 },
    { "feature_name": "num_of_key_findings", "feature_value": 5 },
    { "feature_name": "num_of_action_items", "feature_value": 5 }
  ]
}

item.name: Long Conversation - Shortness of Breath with Exercise

body.raw:
{
  "agent_name": "medical_conversation_insights",
  "user_id": "{{user_id}}",
  "session_id": "{{session_id}}",
  "sender": "USER",
  "query": [
    { "speaker": "Patient", "text": "I've been having shortness of breath for the past week" },
    { "speaker": "Doctor", "text": "When does it occur?" },
    { "speaker": "Patient", "text": "Mainly when I walk up stairs or exercise" },
    { "speaker": "Doctor", "text": "Do you have any chest pain or discomfort?" },
    { "speaker": "Patient", "text": "Sometimes, it feels like pressure in my chest when I'm short of breath" },
    { "speaker": "Doctor", "text": "Any swelling in your legs or ankles?" },
    { "speaker": "Patient", "text": "Not that I've noticed" },
    { "speaker": "Doctor", "text": "Do you have a cough or produce any mucus?" },
    { "speaker": "Patient", "text": "A little bit, mostly dry cough" },
    { "speaker": "Doctor", "text": "Any history of asthma or heart problems?" },
    { "speaker": "Patient", "text": "My father had heart issues, but I've never been diagnosed with anything" },
    { "speaker": "Doctor", "text": "We should do an EKG and chest X-ray to rule out cardiac issues" }
  ],
  "features": [
    { "feature_name": "summary_length", "feature_value": 400 },
    { "feature_name": "num_of_key_findings", "feature_value": 6 },
    { "feature_name": "num_of_action_items", "feature_value": 6 }
  ]
}

item.name: Detailed Consultation - Routine Checkup with Concerns

body.raw:
{
  "agent_name": "medical_conversation_insights",
  "user_id": "{{user_id}}",
  "session_id": "{{session_id}}",
  "sender": "USER",
  "query": [
    { "speaker": "Patient", "text": "I'm here for my annual checkup" },
    { "speaker": "Doctor", "text": "How are you feeling overall?" },
    { "speaker": "Patient", "text": "Generally good, but I've been feeling more tired than usual" },
    { "speaker": "Doctor", "text": "Any changes in your diet, exercise, or sleep patterns?" },
    { "speaker": "Patient", "text": "Not really, same routine as before. Still exercising 3 times a week" },
    { "speaker": "Doctor", "text": "Any other concerns or symptoms you want to discuss?" },
    { "speaker": "Patient", "text": "I've been getting headaches more frequently, maybe 2-3 times a week" },
    { "speaker": "Doctor", "text": "How severe are they on a scale of 1-10?" },
    { "speaker": "Patient", "text": "Usually around 5-6, manageable with ibuprofen" },
    { "speaker": "Doctor", "text": "We should check your blood pressure and possibly run some blood work" },
    { "speaker": "Patient", "text": "Okay, that sounds good. Should I be worried?" },
    { "speaker": "Doctor", "text": "Not necessarily, but let's rule out common causes like hypertension or vitamin deficiencies" }
  ],
  "features": [
    { "feature_name": "summary_length", "feature_value": 350 },
    { "feature_name": "num_of_key_findings", "feature_value": 5 },
    { "feature_name": "num_of_action_items", "feature_value": 5 }
  ]
}

{
  "agent_name": "medical_conversation_insights",
  "user_id": "{{user_id}}",
  "session_id": "{{session_id}}",
  "sender": "USER",
  "query": [
    { "speaker": "Doctor", "text": "How has your blood sugar been since our last visit?" },
    { "speaker": "Patient", "text": "It's been mostly stable, between 110-140 fasting" },
    { "speaker": "Doctor", "text": "That's good. Are you checking it regularly?" },
    { "speaker": "Patient", "text": "Yes, twice a day as you recommended" },
    { "speaker": "Doctor", "text": "Any episodes of hypoglycemia or feeling dizzy?" },
    { "speaker": "Patient", "text": "A couple times after my morning workout, I felt a bit shaky" },
    { "speaker": "Doctor", "text": "Are you eating something before exercise?" },
    { "speaker": "Patient", "text": "Not always, sometimes I just have coffee" },
    { "speaker": "Doctor", "text": "You should have a small snack before exercising. How's your diet otherwise?" },
    { "speaker": "Patient", "text": "I've been following the meal plan, cutting down on carbs" },
    { "speaker": "Doctor", "text": "Good. Let's check your A1C today and adjust medication if needed" },
    { "speaker": "Patient", "text": "Sounds good. Also, I've lost about 10 pounds since last time" },
    { "speaker": "Doctor", "text": "Excellent! That will definitely help with your blood sugar control" }
  ],
  "features": [
    { "feature_name": "summary_length", "feature_value": 450 },
    { "feature_name": "num_of_key_findings", "feature_value": 7 },
    { "feature_name": "num_of_action_items", "feature_value": 7 }
  ]
}

{
  "agent_name": "medical_conversation_insights",
  "user_id": "{{user_id}}",
  "session_id": "{{session_id}}",
  "sender": "USER",
  "query": [
    { "speaker": "Patient", "text": "I have a sore throat and fever" },
    { "speaker": "Doctor", "text": "How long have you had these symptoms?" },
    { "speaker": "Patient", "text": "Started yesterday evening" },
    { "speaker": "Doctor", "text": "Any difficulty swallowing?" },
    { "speaker": "Patient", "text": "Yes, it hurts when I swallow" }
  ],
  "features": []
}
